item.title: Power Automate: Troubleshooting for connecting to local PostgreSQL (requires Npqsql 4.0.17.0 to be installed)
item.description: Got problem when use PostgreSQL in Power Automate,requires Npqsql 4.0.17.0 to be installed ? This article may give you a lead for solving the problem.
